message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration of its unique features and potential benefits, I believe it would be an excellent fit for your needs. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $2000000. I am confident it will provide significant value and return on investment for you.

Dear Alice, thank you for your offer. After careful consideration, I am willing to make a counteroffer of $1800000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and features. I look forward to hearing back from you.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. In light of your proposal, I would like to extend a counteroffer of $1900000 for the product. This price reflects its high quality, unique features, and potential long-term benefits. I hope this aligns more closely with your expectations.

Dear Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After re-evaluating the product's value, I am willing to make a new counteroffer of $1750000. I believe this price is more reasonable considering the market value of similar products. I hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective and respect your valuation of our product. In response, I propose a counteroffer of $1850000. This price reflects the product's superior quality, unique features, and potential long-term benefits. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our interests.

Dear Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your persistence in finding a mutually beneficial agreement. However, I am still hesitant to go above $1750000. I am willing to meet you halfway and make a new counteroffer of $1800000. I believe this is the highest price I am willing to pay for the product, considering its value and my budget. I hope we can come to an agreement.
